name: lvb
description: This is an adult mod for Stellaris, adding all sorts of adult-themed content. It was originally based on [Lustful Void|https://www.loverslab.com/topic/119724-mod-stellaris-lustful-void-wip], but has since expanded greatly. It stil includes come content from Lithia<3 and other previous modders that she coppied from, and is designed with compatibility for Lustful Void in mind.

scripts.release: npm run build && rm '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' || true && cd mod && zip -r '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' '!!!LV Blue Edits' '!!!LV Blue Edits.mod' && mv '!!!LV Blue Edits.zip' ..
